title: Terrorism and Trump: Is this the New Normal? (Maajid Nawaz) | BoF VOICES
itunes:title: Terrorism and Trump: Is this the New Normal? (Maajid Nawaz) | BoF VOICES
itunes:subtitle: Reformed jihadist, Maajid Naaz, focused on the rise of terrorism, populism and a post-Trump, post-Brexit world — by detailing his own harrowing journey. #BoFVOICES 2016To sign up to the Daily Digest newsletter click the link here: http://bit.ly/BoFne
description:
Reformed jihadist, Maajid Naaz, focused on the rise of terrorism, populism and a post-Trump, post-Brexit world — by detailing his own harrowing journey. #BoFVOICES 2016

To sign up to the Daily Digest newsletter click the link here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews
